metadata.description: For a recap of the Brand New Day event, grab yourself a copy of this Spider-Man Yearbook -- featuring an illustrated, Saga-style synopsis of the Spectacular Spider-Man Brain-Trust of Bob Gale, Marc Guggenheim, Joe Kelly, Dan Slott, Mark Waid and Zeb Wells! Get to know the BND Spider-Cast intimately with Official Handbook profiles spotlighting "Best Dressed" Jackpot, "Most Likely to Succeed" Anti-Venom, "Worst Breath" Freak, "Class Clown" Screwball and more!
metadata.name: Spider-Man: Brand New Day Yearbook
